rule.description: You can enter this setting through the right-click menu on any web page. When entering from a web page, the URL of the web page will be added as a rule by default. You can edit the rules. The available formats are explained below.

url.title: URL mode, complete URL.
url.explain: This method can match the complete URL.

glob.title: The glob method uses the {{1}} library. Please see for usage, or you can search for the usage of {{2}}.

example.a: {{1}}, which matches the YouTube homepage and all subpages.

regexp.title: Regular expression, please see See for usage.

onlyForCurrentRule.title: Only takes effect for the current rule:
onlyForCurrentRule.explain: If checked, it can only be used for the current rule, otherwise all global rules can be used.
